name: Synthetix
description: Synthetix is the backbone for derivatives trading in DeFi. It helps users to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.

en.name: Synthetix
en.description: Synthetix is the backbone for derivatives trading in DeFi. It helps users to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.

fr.name: Synthetix
fr.description: Synthetix est l'épine dorsale du trading de produits dérivés dans la DeFi. Le protocol aide les utilisateurs à s'exposer à une vaste gamme d'actifs on-chain.

es.name: Synthetix
es.description: Synthetix es la columna vertebral para el comercio de derivados en DeFi. Ayuda a los usuarios a obtener exposición on-chain a una amplia gama de activos.

de.name: Synthetix
de.description: Synthetix ist das Kernstück des Derivatehandels in DeFi. Es hilft den Nutzern, eine breite Palette von Vermögenswerten auf der Kette kennenzulernen.

pt.name: Synthetix
pt.description: Synthetix é a espinha dorsal da negociação de derivativos em DeFi. Ele ajuda os usuários a obter exposição na rede a uma vasta gama de ativos.

el.name: Synthetix
el.description: Synthetix is the backbone for derivatives trading in DeFi. It helps users to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.

tr.name: Synthetix
tr.description: Synthetix, DeFi'de türev ticaretinin belkemiğidir. kullanıcıların çok çeşitli varlıklara on-chain keşfetmelerini sağlar.

vi.name: Synthetix
vi.description: Synthetix is the backbone for derivatives trading in DeFi. It helps users to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.

zh.name: Synthetix
zh.description: Synthetix 是 DeFi 衍生品交易的基石。用户通过 Synthetix 可以获得大量资产的线上交易机会。

hi.name: Synthetix
hi.description: Synthetix DeFi में डेरिवेटिव ट्रेडिंग की रीढ़ है। यह उपयोगकर्ताओं को परिसंपत्तियों की एक विस्तृत श्रृंखला के लिए ऑन-चेन एक्सपोजर हासिल करने में मदद करता है।

ja.description: Synthetix is the backbone for derivatives trading in DeFi. It helps users to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.
